models.name: healthcare_platform_organizations
models.description: Represents a top-level tenant or organization (hospital, clinic, practice) within the healthcarePlatform system. Defines the overall data isolation boundary for all entity assignments, resources, and business operations. Serves as the ultimate parent in the multi-tenant data model. Relationships: has many departments, staff assignments, configurations, locale settings. Critical for RBAC, compliance, and resource partitioning.

plainFields.name: code
plainFields.description: Unique business code for the organization (assigned for technical or cross-system mapping).

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: Official organization name for display and legal documentation.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Current status of the organization (active, suspended, pending, archived, etc.).

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Creation timestamp for the organization.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp for the organization.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete timestamp for archival/compliance retention (null if active).

models.name: healthcare_platform_departments
models.description: A department or business unit within an organization (e.g., Cardiology, Radiology, Billing). Departments are mapped to an organization and provide an isolated context for department head assignments, scheduling, and resource allocation. Enables finer-grained access control and workflow partitioning within each organization.

plainFields.name: code
plainFields.description: Short code for the department (unique within organization for business logic).

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: Display/legal name for the department.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Current status of the department (active, suspended, pending, archived, etc.).

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Department creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last modification timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft-delete timestamp (null = active).

models.name: healthcare_platform_roles
models.description: Represents platform-wide and organization-level roles (e.g., admin, doctor, nurse, technician, patient, receptionist). Defines RBAC and permission boundaries. Roles can be platform global, organization-scoped, or department-scoped depending on configuration. Used in conjunction with permissions and user assignments.

plainFields.name: code
plainFields.description: Role code used for assignment, internal mappings, and cross-system integration (e.g., 'system_admin', 'organization_admin', 'medical_doctor').

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: Role display name.

plainFields.name: scope_type
plainFields.description: Level at which this role applies: platform, organization, department.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Current status of the role (active, retired, system-only, archived, etc.).

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Role creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last role update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft-delete timestamp for role archival (null=active).

models.name: healthcare_platform_permissions
models.description: Permission entity defining a specific actionable operation or scope (e.g., 'manage_users', 'view_ehr', 'edit_billing'). Used in RBAC to define which actions are available for which roles. Permissions can be assigned to roles at platform, org, or department level. Enables granular authorization policies.

plainFields.name: code
plainFields.description: Unique code for this permission (e.g., 'edit_patient_record').

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: Human-readable name for this permission.

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Explanation of the permission's intent and usage scenario.

plainFields.name: scope_type
plainFields.description: Level at which this permission is applicable: platform, organization, department.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Current status of the permission (active, retired, system, etc.).

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete timestamp if permission is retired.

models.name: healthcare_platform_org_department_assignments
models.description: Maps organizations to departments for organizational hierarchy management and delegation workflows. Each row links a department to its parent organization with timestamp and audit trail for team structures. Enables complex org/department relationship enforcement and permission propagation.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Assignment creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Assignment update timestamp (last structural change).

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete timestamp for assignment. Null if currently active.

models.name: healthcare_platform_user_org_assignments
models.description: Mapping table assigning users to organizations for platform access, RBAC, and scoped business operations. Critical for multi-tenant data and permission enforcement. Each record ties a user to a single org (others are referenced from user tables in other components). Assignment timestamp and status are tracked for audit and access review.

foreignFields.name: user_id
foreignFields.description: Reference to user in global user tables (e.g., healthcare_platform_systemadmins, organizationadmins, etc. in other components).

foreignFields.name: healthcare_platform_organization_id
foreignFields.description: Organization this user is assigned to. {@link healthcare_platform_organizations.id}.

plainFields.name: role_code
plainFields.description: Role code for assigned user within this organization instance (syncs with roles in roles table).

plainFields.name: assignment_status
plainFields.description: Current assignment status (active, pending, suspended, deleted).

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Assignment creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Assignment update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete timestamp, null if assignment is active.

models.name: healthcare_platform_configuration
models.description: Represents system-wide and per-organization configuration settings. Stores configuration keys and values for customizable, versioned, and auditable settings. Can be global (if organization_id is null) or linked to a specific organization for tenant-scoped config. Only business/operational configuration data (never clinical or PHI).

foreignFields.name: healthcare_platform_organization_id
foreignFields.description: Organization this config applies to (nullable for global configs). {@link healthcare_platform_organizations.id}.

plainFields.name: key
plainFields.description: Configuration key (e.g., 'language', 'timezone', 'feature_flag_name').

plainFields.name: value
plainFields.description: Configuration value as string (can be serialized for structured values).

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Description of what this config controls and its impact.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Config record creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last configuration update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete timestamp, null if active.

models.name: healthcare_platform_locale_settings
models.description: Stores locale and regionalization settings for the platform or specific organizations/departments (time zone, language, formatting). Used for translation and location-aware experiences. Unique per organization/department context, providing override hierarchy. Only technical/business localization.

foreignFields.name: healthcare_platform_organization_id
foreignFields.description: Organization for which the locale settings apply. Nullable for platform-global settings. {@link healthcare_platform_organizations.id}.

foreignFields.name: healthcare_platform_department_id
foreignFields.description: (Optional) Department for which these settings are specifically applied. Nullable if org-level or platform global. {@link healthcare_platform_departments.id}.

plainFields.name: language
plainFields.description: Language code (e.g., en-US, es-ES) for localization.

plainFields.name: timezone
plainFields.description: IANA timezone string for scheduling/notifications (e.g., 'America/New_York').

plainFields.name: date_format
plainFields.description: Default date display format (e.g., YYYY-MM-DD, MM/DD/YYYY).

plainFields.name: time_format
plainFields.description: Default time display format (e.g., 24h, 12h).

plainFields.name: number_format
plainFields.description: Number formatting convention for region/country (e.g., 1,234.56 vs 1.234,56).

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Settings record creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Settings last update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete timestamp, null if settings are active.

models.name: healthcare_platform_systemadmins
models.description: System-wide superuser administrators responsible for platform management, cross-organization configuration, integrations, operational monitoring, and global audit. These users have highest privileges and are subject to highest audit standards. Assignment is strictly controlled; linked to organizations and audit/event logs via separate assignment and audit tables.

plainFields.name: email
plainFields.description: Email address for login and notifications. Must be unique; business-only, no personal domains allowed.

plainFields.name: full_name
plainFields.description: Full legal name of the system admin.

plainFields.name: phone
plainFields.description: Business phone number for contact and MFA challenges.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when admin account was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp for this account.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete marker; indicates if the admin record is deactivated/retired.

models.name: healthcare_platform_organizationadmins
models.description: Organization-level administrators responsible for managing users, policies, configuration, billing, reporting, and compliance for an individual healthcare tenant. Role-limited to specific organizations and referenced from org assignment table. Subject to audit and strict workflow constraints.

plainFields.name: email
plainFields.description: Business email for organization admin login. Must be unique within platform.

plainFields.name: full_name
plainFields.description: Full legal name of organization admin.

plainFields.name: phone
plainFields.description: Contact number for notifications and security events.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when admin account was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when admin account was last updated.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion marker indicating org admin is deactivated.

models.name: healthcare_platform_departmentheads
models.description: Clinical or operational department heads within organizations, responsible for staff/resource management, analytics, scheduling, and internal approvals. Each department head is linked to an organization and may be referenced in department assignment tables. Direct permissions scoped to department context.

plainFields.name: email
plainFields.description: Business email used for login and escalations. Must be unique across all department heads.

plainFields.name: full_name
plainFields.description: Full legal name of department head.

plainFields.name: phone
plainFields.description: Business phone for alerts and access confirmation.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp for account creation date.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp for this record.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete marker indicating deactivation or transfer.

models.name: healthcare_platform_medicaldoctors
models.description: Licensed medical professionals responsible for patient care, diagnosis, order entry, prescriptions, and care coordination within an organization. Each doctor may be referenced from assignments and credential verification tables. Extensive audit obligations.

plainFields.name: email
plainFields.description: Unique business email for system login and clinical communication.

plainFields.name: full_name
plainFields.description: Full legal name as registered for licensure and clinical privilege.

plainFields.name: npi_number
plainFields.description: National Provider Identifier (NPI) for credential verification; must be unique for each doctor.

plainFields.name: specialty
plainFields.description: Clinical specialty (e.g., Cardiology, Pediatrics).

plainFields.name: phone
plainFields.description: Contact number for notifications and emergency alerts.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp of account creation.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp of last update to doctor record.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion; null unless this doctor account is archived/inactive.

models.name: healthcare_platform_nurses
models.description: Clinical nursing staff responsible for patient care, monitoring, medication administration, and supporting clinical workflows. Nurses have distinct scope and privilege and undergo credential verification. Each nurse is referenced by assignments and audit logs. Audit trails required for all patient-related activity.

plainFields.name: email
plainFields.description: Business email for login and staff communication. Must be unique among nurses.

plainFields.name: full_name
plainFields.description: Full legal name of nurse, as used for credentials and patient-facing activity.

plainFields.name: license_number
plainFields.description: State-issued license/certification for clinical practice. Must be unique for auditing.

plainFields.name: specialty
plainFields.description: Primary clinical area of nursing (optional, e.g., ICU, Med/Surg).

plainFields.name: phone
plainFields.description: Work/personal phone for shift notifications and alerts.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when nurse account was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp for last modification to nurse record.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion/archival status field.

models.name: healthcare_platform_technicians
models.description: Technical clinical staff involved in diagnostics, imaging, equipment management, and lab processing. Techs have separate credential validation and have access limited to technical orders. Referenced from assignment and audit logs.

plainFields.name: email
plainFields.description: Business email for login and shift notification. Unique among all technicians.

plainFields.name: full_name
plainFields.description: Full legal name for credentialing purposes.

plainFields.name: license_number
plainFields.description: Technical/professional license for role (state or registry). Must be unique.

plainFields.name: specialty
plainFields.description: Field of technical expertise (Radiology, Phlebotomy, etc).

plainFields.name: phone
plainFields.description: Contact number for scheduling, emergencies.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: When technician account was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Date/time when technician data last updated.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion / archive marker.

models.name: healthcare_platform_receptionists
models.description: Reception/admin users who schedule appointments, manage check-in/out, update patient basic info. No clinical privileges. May be referenced from assignment and workflow/lifecycle tables.

plainFields.name: email
plainFields.description: Receptionist login and business email. Unique for this table.

plainFields.name: full_name
plainFields.description: Full name of the receptionist for identification and messaging.

plainFields.name: phone
plainFields.description: Business or organizational contact number.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Creation timestamp of receptionist record.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp for last update to this account.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion field; receptionist account is deactivated.

models.name: healthcare_platform_patients
models.description: Patient/consumer users of the system. Patients can self-register or be registered by staff, manage personal health info and records, appointments, and billing. All personal health information (PHI) managed under regulatory obligations. No direct references to department, assignment, or staff tables here; handled via relationships. Consent, privacy flag, and record assignments handled via separate tables.

plainFields.name: email
plainFields.description: Personal or organizational email for login and portal notifications. Must be unique for all patients.

plainFields.name: full_name
plainFields.description: Legal full name as used in identity or insurance documents.

plainFields.name: date_of_birth
plainFields.description: Date of birth for patient identity, required for matching and legal compliance.

plainFields.name: phone
plainFields.description: Contact number for reminders and portal communications.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Account creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update time for patient profile.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion/closure marking, if account is closed or deregistered.

models.name: healthcare_platform_user_authentications
models.description: Authentication records supporting login via email/password, SSO, or federated provider for any user entity (reference by actor type). Stores hashed credentials, provider keys, SSO tokens, and authentication method. Used for login, session validation, and audit. Strictly subsidiary, managed by system APIs.

plainFields.name: user_id
plainFields.description: UUID of the user this authentication record belongs to (cross-table reference by user/actor type).

plainFields.name: user_type
plainFields.description: Indicates which actor table this refers to (systemadmin, orgadmin, etc). Used for business logic and query purposes.

plainFields.name: provider
plainFields.description: The authentication provider (local, saml, oauth2, ad).

plainFields.name: provider_key
plainFields.description: Provider-specific user or session key (may be SSO subject, user_id, etc).

plainFields.name: password_hash
plainFields.description: Bcrypt hash for local credentials (optional for SSO providers).

plainFields.name: last_authenticated_at
plainFields.description: When this user last successfully authenticated via this record/provider.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when auth record was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last modification to this authentication record.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete field for rotation/retire.

models.name: healthcare_platform_auth_sessions
models.description: Authentication session records, tracking issued tokens (JWT, refresh), session state, expiry, revocation, and business context for all user types (referenced by user_id/user_type). Used for permissions, revocation, audit. Sessions can be forcibly terminated by business or security rules. Strict subsidiary stance.

plainFields.name: user_id
plainFields.description: Reference to the user associated with this session. Cross-table reference.

plainFields.name: user_type
plainFields.description: Table/type discriminator for the user (systemadmin/orgadmin/etc).

plainFields.name: session_token
plainFields.description: Opaque session token or JWT; unique value for session management.

plainFields.name: refresh_token
plainFields.description: Refresh token for session extension; null for some SSO providers.

plainFields.name: issued_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp for session start/issue.

plainFields.name: expires_at
plainFields.description: Session planned expiration. Subject to renewal or rotation policies.

plainFields.name: revoked_at
plainFields.description: When the session was forcibly terminated/expired; null if still active.

plainFields.name: user_agent
plainFields.description: User agent/browser/device info for session security/audit.

plainFields.name: ip_address
plainFields.description: IP address for session source logging.

models.name: healthcare_platform_user_mfa_factors
models.description: Multi-factor authentication factor records for users, including TOTP, SMS, email challenge, or security keys. Used for MFA enforcement and account recovery. Each factor is scoped per user and user type, and only one of each factor type is active at a time per user. Strictly subsidiary; managed by system APIs.

plainFields.name: user_id
plainFields.description: The user to whom this MFA factor belongs. Cross-table reference.

plainFields.name: user_type
plainFields.description: Table/type discriminator for user (systemadmin, etc).

plainFields.name: factor_type
plainFields.description: Type of MFA factor (totp, sms, email, webauthn, backup). Supports type inference in application.

plainFields.name: factor_value
plainFields.description: Encoded value or key for the MFA factor (encrypted, as appropriate for type).

plainFields.name: priority
plainFields.description: Sort priority/order for use during challenge (lower is primary factor).

plainFields.name: is_active
plainFields.description: Indicates whether this factor is enabled for challenge.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Create time for this MFA factor record.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last modification to MFA configuration.

models.name: healthcare_platform_user_credentials
models.description: Credential archive and metadata for user authentication events and password state history (e.g., previous password hashes, SSO credential history, rotation). Used for audit, rollback, and security. Archived credentials are never active after rotation. Strictly subsidiary stance.

plainFields.name: user_id
plainFields.description: The associated user record for these credentials. Cross-table reference.

plainFields.name: user_type
plainFields.description: User table/type discriminator for credentials (systemadmin, etc).

plainFields.name: credential_type
plainFields.description: Type of credential archived (password, sso, certificate, webauthn, etc).

plainFields.name: credential_hash
plainFields.description: Hash or encoded credential value (historical, not active).

plainFields.name: archived_at
plainFields.description: Time when credential became inactive or was rotated.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when credential was first active.

models.name: healthcare_platform_user_license_verifications
models.description: Professional license/NPI/status check records for users who require licensure (doctors, nurses, technicians). Reflects compliance with NPI registry or state agency and tracks last check, status, failures, and audit compliance. May be referenced from automated or manual review processes. Strictly subsidiary table.

plainFields.name: user_id
plainFields.description: The actor undergoing credential/license check (doctor/nurse/tech). Cross-table reference.

plainFields.name: user_type
plainFields.description: Discriminator for user/actor type (medicaldoctor/nurse/technician).

plainFields.name: license_number
plainFields.description: License or registration number being checked. Invariant per user.

plainFields.name: license_type
plainFields.description: Type of license/credential (medical, nurse, tech, etc).

plainFields.name: verification_status
plainFields.description: Result of current/most recent check (valid/expired/suspended/pending).

plainFields.name: last_verified_at
plainFields.description: Last time verification was attempted/recorded.

plainFields.name: suspend_reason
plainFields.description: Reason for suspension or problem, if applicable.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation timestamp for initial check event.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp (may include failure, renewal, or audit event).

models.name: healthcare_platform_patient_records
models.description: Central patient record entity representing the unique profile and clinical record anchor for a patient within the healthcare organization. This holds core patient metadata, life-cycle status, demographic data, and foreign references to the organization, department, and patient user. All EHR encounters, amendments, audit trails, and privacy controls hang off this entity. It is the root for longitudinal clinical history and compliance workflows. Searchable independently, supports soft-delete and privacy enforcement.

plainFields.name: external_patient_number
plainFields.description: External or legacy medical record number for reconciliation with upstream EMRs.

plainFields.name: full_name
plainFields.description: Patient's legal full name for search and display. Used for GIN search.

plainFields.name: dob
plainFields.description: Date of birth of the patient.

plainFields.name: gender
plainFields.description: Patient's gender identity (self-identified, can be blank or 'undisclosed').

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Business status (active, inactive, deceased, transferred, etc).

plainFields.name: demographics_json
plainFields.description: JSON blob for extensible structured demographic fields (race, ethnicity, language, etc).

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation datetime.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Record update datetime.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete timestamp (null if active).

models.name: healthcare_platform_ehr_encounters
models.description: Clinical care encounter events for a given patient record. This table captures each discrete clinical or administrative event: admission, consult, outpatient visit, telehealth, etc. Each encounter is linked to a patient record and supporting metadata fields, and independently audited for compliance. Allows direct search and filter. Entry point for attached clinical data, lab results, medical images, etc.

foreignFields.name: provider_user_id
foreignFields.description: Primary provider's user id for this encounter {@link healthcare_platform_medicaldoctors.id}.

plainFields.name: encounter_type
plainFields.description: Type of the encounter (e.g., office_visit, inpatient_admission, telemedicine, emergency, etc).

plainFields.name: encounter_start_at
plainFields.description: Datetime when encounter started.

plainFields.name: encounter_end_at
plainFields.description: Datetime when encounter ended (or null if ongoing).

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Status of the encounter (planned, active, completed, cancelled, etc).

plainFields.name: notes
plainFields.description: Free text encounter summary for clinical documentation.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete timestamp (null if active).

models.name: healthcare_platform_ehr_versions
models.description: Snapshot table holding all historical versions of a patient's EHR record at encounter level. Each EHR version captures a point-in-time clinical state for audit, compliance, and rollback. Append-only, created at each save or amendment. Includes composite foreign keys to parent encounter and submitter, and contains the full EHR JSON payload as submitted for clinical operations, audit, and regulatory review.

foreignFields.name: submitted_by_user_id
foreignFields.description: User who submitted/created this version {@link healthcare_platform_medicaldoctors.id}.

plainFields.name: version_number
plainFields.description: Sequence number for versioning within encounter.

plainFields.name: snapshot_json
plainFields.description: JSON payload of structured EHR content at this version (immutable).

plainFields.name: reason_for_update
plainFields.description: Reason or event triggering version update (e.g., correction, routine, regulatory, patient request).

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Version creation timestamp.

models.name: healthcare_platform_record_amendments
models.description: Append-only table capturing patient record amendments, corrections, or updates that require full audit and regulatory compliance. All proposed and approved changes are logged here, with actor, rationale, approval status, and direct linkage to record and/or encounter. Supports workflows for regulatory amendment, patient-initiated requests, clinical corrections, etc.

foreignFields.name: submitted_by_user_id
foreignFields.description: User who submitted the amendment {@link healthcare_platform_nurses.id} or similar role.

foreignFields.name: reviewed_by_user_id
foreignFields.description: Reviewer/approver's user id, if required by workflow.

foreignFields.name: ehr_encounter_id
foreignFields.description: Targeted EHR encounter (if amendment is to a specific event) {@link healthcare_platform_ehr_encounters.id}.

plainFields.name: amendment_type
plainFields.description: Type of amendment (correction, patient_request, regulatory, etc).

plainFields.name: old_value_json
plainFields.description: Prior value (serialized JSON form, to support review/storage).

plainFields.name: new_value_json
plainFields.description: New value (after amendment).

plainFields.name: rationale
plainFields.description: Reason/justification submitted with amendment.

plainFields.name: approval_status
plainFields.description: Approval status (pending, approved, rejected, null if not applicable).

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Amendment created timestamp.

models.name: healthcare_platform_record_audit_trails
models.description: Immutable audit log table recording every user or system action on patient records and EHRs. Provides a tamper-evident record for regulatory compliance, security, and medical-legal evidence. Captures the actor, timestamp, action, before/after state, request details, and event context. Used for investigation and compliance reporting.

foreignFields.name: patient_record_id
foreignFields.description: Patient record for which event is audited {@link healthcare_platform_patient_records.id}.

foreignFields.name: actor_user_id
foreignFields.description: Actor user id (may be care team or admin user) for this action.

plainFields.name: audit_action
plainFields.description: Action performed (create, update, delete, access, lock, unlock, emergency_access_override, etc).

plainFields.name: event_context_json
plainFields.description: JSON context for additional event details (e.g., client device info, session, location).

plainFields.name: before_state_json
plainFields.description: Serialized form of entity prior to this event.

plainFields.name: after_state_json
plainFields.description: Serialized after-event state, if updated.

plainFields.name: request_reason
plainFields.description: User/system provided justification or trigger, if supplied.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Audit event timestamp.

models.name: healthcare_platform_legacy_ehr_imports
models.description: Support table for legacy EHR/EPR (electronic medical record) data imported from upstream/legacy EMR solutions. Serves as a cold archive; not managed directly through APIs, but needed for historical clinical/legal access. Links to patient record, stores original identifiers, import timestamp, and raw EHR JSON. Used for compliance, investigation, and data mapping but not for active workflows. Subsidiary only.

plainFields.name: legacy_system_name
plainFields.description: Source system/provider for legacy data (e.g., "Epic", "Cerner").

plainFields.name: legacy_ehr_id
plainFields.description: Original id from source EHR (for mapping/reference).

plainFields.name: raw_ehr_json
plainFields.description: Original EHR JSON (read-only, archival).

plainFields.name: imported_at
plainFields.description: Import timestamp.

models.name: healthcare_platform_medical_images
models.description: Stores metadata and references to medical images (e.g., DICOM series) associated with an EHR encounter/event. Each record points to storage URI, basic image metadata, linked patient and EHR encounter ids, with upload/creation provenance for clinical and audit workflows. Critical for radiology, imaging management, and regulatory retention.

foreignFields.name: uploaded_by_user_id
foreignFields.description: User (typically technician) who uploaded image record.

plainFields.name: image_type
plainFields.description: Type of medical image (DICOM, JPEG, PNG, etc).

plainFields.name: image_uri
plainFields.description: Storage URI of image file in secure system.

plainFields.name: image_metadata_json
plainFields.description: Serialized metadata (e.g., series, study_uid, acquisition_params).

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Image upload timestamp.

models.name: healthcare_platform_image_annotations
models.description: Subsidiary table for user or AI-generated annotations on medical images. Each annotation references a specific image, annotation text or measurement, and the user who authored it. Serves radiology, AI diagnostics, and audit traceability needs. Not standalone business entity; governed via parent image audit.

plainFields.name: annotation_text
plainFields.description: Annotation free-text or label (radiology description, measurement, or AI note).

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Annotation creation datetime.

models.name: healthcare_platform_lab_results
models.description: Primary table for storing clinical laboratory results belonging to a given EHR encounter (e.g., blood test, result panels, PCRs). Each result is linked to an encounter and reporting lab integration. Full JSON payload captured, plus reporting status and clinical alert indicators. Key business entity for longitudinal data analysis and compliance reporting.

plainFields.name: test_name
plainFields.description: Name of test/panel performed.

plainFields.name: test_result_value_json
plainFields.description: Serialized (JSON) value of result or panel (machine and units).

plainFields.name: result_flag
plainFields.description: Clinical flag (normal, abnormal, critical, corrected, etc.).

plainFields.name: resulted_at
plainFields.description: Datetime when result was officially resulted on system.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Status (pending, completed, revised, cancelled).

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Lab result record creation timestamp.

models.name: healthcare_platform_vitals
models.description: Primary table for discrete patient vitals recorded during EHR encounters, e.g., temperature, pulse, respiratory rate, blood pressure, etc. Allows for high-frequency tracked data and enables analytic/alert capabilities. Each entry references encounter and submitting user. Designed for fast independent search, longitudinal analytics, and trend workflows.

foreignFields.name: recorded_by_user_id
foreignFields.description: User who recorded this vital sign measurement.

plainFields.name: vital_type
plainFields.description: Vital sign type (heart_rate, temp_c, bp_systolic, bp_diastolic, etc).

plainFields.name: vital_value
plainFields.description: Value for the vital sign.

plainFields.name: unit
plainFields.description: Units for the vital sign (e.g., bpm, C, mmHg).

plainFields.name: measured_at
plainFields.description: Datetime when measured.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Measurement created timestamp.

models.name: healthcare_platform_patient_privacy_flags
models.description: Subsidiary table for patient-level privacy and restriction enforcement. Flags include do_not_contact, do_not_share, sensitive, etc. Not independently managed; supporting data for access control and review processes. Linked to patient record and optionally to reason or user who enabled the flag.

foreignFields.name: set_by_user_id
foreignFields.description: User who set/approved the flag (admin, privacy officer, etc).

plainFields.name: privacy_flag_type
plainFields.description: Type of flag (do_not_share, sensitive, etc).

plainFields.name: rationale
plainFields.description: Reason for flag setting.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Flag set timestamp.

models.name: healthcare_platform_record_locks
models.description: Subsidiary table for record-level holds, locks, or restrictions (legal, regulatory, audit investigation, etc). Linked to patient record and referencing the user/authority imposing and releasing the lock. Each entry is append-only; supports regulatory disaster recovery and legal workflows. Not a direct API business entity.

foreignFields.name: set_by_user_id
foreignFields.description: User or authority imposing the lock.

foreignFields.name: released_by_user_id
foreignFields.description: User or authority releasing/removing the lock.

plainFields.name: lock_type
plainFields.description: Type of lock/hold (legal, audit, pended, regulatory).

plainFields.name: lock_reason
plainFields.description: Explanation/purpose for lock placement.

plainFields.name: locked_at
plainFields.description: Lock timestamp.

plainFields.name: released_at
plainFields.description: Release timestamp (null if active).

models.name: healthcare_platform_patient_consents
models.description: Patient consent/entity logging table for all issued, updated, or revoked consent statements. Each consent record links to patient record, describing type of consent (treatment, HIPAA, research, sharing, etc), key dates (granted, revoked), scope, and reference to user obtaining or witnessing consent. Provides full regulatory audit of patient privacy and data rights across the record lifecycle. May be restored or queried independently for legal or workflow need.

plainFields.name: consent_type
plainFields.description: Type of consent (treatment, HIPAA, research, data_sharing, etc).

plainFields.name: scope
plainFields.description: Scope/coverage of this consent (clinical, legal, research, data_sharing, etc).

plainFields.name: granted_at
plainFields.description: Datetime when consent was granted.

plainFields.name: revoked_at
plainFields.description: Datetime consent was revoked, if rescinded.

plainFields.name: description_text
plainFields.description: Explanation or patient-supplied rationale.

models.name: healthcare_platform_appointments
models.description: Stores all individual appointment events scheduled between providers and patients. Connects org, department, provider, patient, room, equipment, and appointment status.

foreignFields.name: healthcare_platform_department_id
foreignFields.description: Belonged department's {@link healthcare_platform_departments.id} (nullable for org-level bookings).

plainFields.name: room_id
plainFields.description: Linked room reservation (uuid; not a strict FK in schema—references a room from resource registry or external table).

plainFields.name: equipment_id
plainFields.description: Linked equipment reservation (uuid; not a strict FK—external to this schema file for cross-domain use).

plainFields.name: appointment_type
plainFields.description: Type of appointment (e.g., in-person, telemedicine).

plainFields.name: start_time
plainFields.description: Start time (ISO 8601).

plainFields.name: end_time
plainFields.description: End time (ISO 8601).

plainFields.name: title
plainFields.description: Appointment title.

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Notes and instructions.

plainFields.name: recurrence_rule
plainFields.description: Recurrence rule if repeating (RRULE).

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete timestamp (null if active).

models.name: healthcare_platform_appointment_statuses
models.description: Defines possible appointment states (scheduled, cancelled, confirmed, no-show, etc).

plainFields.name: status_code
plainFields.description: Unique status code (e.g., scheduled, cancelled).

plainFields.name: display_name
plainFields.description: Human label.

plainFields.name: business_status
plainFields.description: Workflow grouping (e.g., active/closed).

plainFields.name: sort_order
plainFields.description: For UI/business sorting.

models.name: healthcare_platform_resource_schedules
models.description: Master resource availability for scheduling (provider, room, equipment) using resource_type (as string) and resource_id (uuid, not strictly a FK to a model in this file; instead a polymorphic external pointer).

plainFields.name: resource_type
plainFields.description: Type/category of resource (provider, room, equipment).

plainFields.name: resource_id
plainFields.description: Polymorphic resource uuid – not foriegnKey in this schema. Points out to external resource (room, provider, equipment, etc.) table.

plainFields.name: available_start_time
plainFields.description: Start of daily slot (e.g., 09:00, 24h/ISO time).

plainFields.name: available_end_time
plainFields.description: End of daily slot (e.g., 18:00, 24h/ISO time).

plainFields.name: recurrence_pattern
plainFields.description: Recurrence pattern (iCal, JSON or custom).

plainFields.name: exception_dates
plainFields.description: Blackout (holiday, maintenance) dates as string or JSON.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete timestamp.

models.name: healthcare_platform_room_reservations
models.description: Room reservations for physical rooms. Each reservation is tied to an org and a room_id uuid, which points to a resource registry or external model (not represented as a FK here).

plainFields.name: room_id
plainFields.description: Room id (uuid only; not a FK in this component – links to room registry).

plainFields.name: reservation_start
plainFields.description: Reservation start time.

plainFields.name: reservation_end
plainFields.description: Reservation end time.

plainFields.name: reservation_type
plainFields.description: Reason: appointment, admin, cleaning, maintenance, etc.

plainFields.name: appointment_id
plainFields.description: Optionally link to appointment (nullable for admin blocks).

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete timestamp.

models.name: healthcare_platform_equipment_reservations
models.description: Equipment bookings or maintenance blocks. Each reservation references an org and equipment_id uuid (external device/resource); not a FK in this schema.

plainFields.name: equipment_id
plainFields.description: Equipment resource id (uuid only; not a FK in this schema).

plainFields.name: reservation_start
plainFields.description: Reservation start timestamp.

plainFields.name: reservation_end
plainFields.description: Reservation end timestamp.

plainFields.name: appointment_id
plainFields.description: Linked appointment if equipment scheduled; nullable otherwise.

plainFields.name: reservation_type
plainFields.description: Reason: scheduled, blocked, maintenance, etc.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete timestamp.

models.name: healthcare_platform_calendar_settings
models.description: Stores scheduling, calendar and booking rules; may be org-wide or per-resource with resource_type (string) and resource_id (uuid, not a FK).

plainFields.name: resource_type
plainFields.description: Type of resource (org-wide, provider, room, equipment).

plainFields.name: resource_id
plainFields.description: Resource id for whom the settings apply (uuid; not a FK in this schema). Nullable for org-wide.

plainFields.name: business_days
plainFields.description: Business open days (e.g., '["Mon","Tue"]'), JSON string.

plainFields.name: availability_hours
plainFields.description: Standard window (e.g., '08:00-18:00').

plainFields.name: min_lead_time_minutes
plainFields.description: Min advance booking (minutes).

plainFields.name: min_cancel_window_minutes
plainFields.description: Min allowed cancellation notice (minutes).

plainFields.name: blackout_dates
plainFields.description: Blackout (holiday, etc.) dates as string/JSON.

plainFields.name: post_appointment_survey_enabled
plainFields.description: Enable auto-survey after visit.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete timestamp.

models.name: healthcare_platform_telemedicine_sessions
models.description: Manages join link, session times and attendance for virtual appointments. 1:1 with appointment if used.

plainFields.name: join_link
plainFields.description: Virtual session secure link.

plainFields.name: session_start
plainFields.description: Session start (scheduled).

plainFields.name: session_end
plainFields.description: Session end (actual/closed).

plainFields.name: provider_joined_at
plainFields.description: Provider join time.

plainFields.name: patient_joined_at
plainFields.description: Patient join time.

plainFields.name: session_recorded
plainFields.description: If recording enabled.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Updated.

models.name: healthcare_platform_appointment_reminders
models.description: Tracks reminder notifications sent as part of the appointment lifecycle, for SLA/notification audits. Subsidiary under appointment. Not directly user-managed; joins the linked appointment.

plainFields.name: reminder_time
plainFields.description: Send time for notice.

plainFields.name: recipient_type
plainFields.description: Recipient (patient, provider, both).

plainFields.name: recipient_id
plainFields.description: Recipient user id.

plainFields.name: delivery_channel
plainFields.description: Delivery channel: email, sms, in-app, etc.

plainFields.name: delivery_status
plainFields.description: Notification status (sent, failed, etc).

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Updated.

models.name: healthcare_platform_appointment_waitlists
models.description: Tracks users awaiting slot on already-filled appointments; processed within the appointment's lifecycle, not independently user-managed.

plainFields.name: join_time
plainFields.description: When user requested waitlist join.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Current status (active, promoted, removed, etc).

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Updated.

models.name: healthcare_platform_billing_invoices
models.description: Primary entity representing a billing invoice issued by the healthcare organization to a patient and/or payer, referencing clinical encounters and aggregating billable service items. Connected to organization, patient, billing items, payments, and claims. Uniquely identified by invoice_number per organization. Includes audit and status metadata for compliance and workflow tracking.

plainFields.name: invoice_number
plainFields.description: Business invoice number, unique per organization for financial tracking and reconciliation. Required for billing and audit.

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Description or purpose of the invoice. May summarize bundled services, visit, or care episode.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Current invoice status (e.g., draft, sent, paid, overdue, canceled). Supports billing workflow, status transitions, and analytics.

plainFields.name: total_amount
plainFields.description: Total amount due on the invoice, before adjustments and after all itemization. In base currency units (e.g., USD).

plainFields.name: currency
plainFields.description: Invoice currency code (e.g., USD, EUR). Used for multi-currency support in multi-national deployments.

plainFields.name: due_date
plainFields.description: Date and time when payment is due. Used for reminders and overdue status logic.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Invoice creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp for invoice. Updated on each material change.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft-delete marker. When non-null, invoice is logically deleted but preserved for compliance audit.

models.name: healthcare_platform_billing_items
models.description: Individual itemization of services or products billed on each invoice—e.g., procedures, medications, supplies. References an invoice and a billing code for audit and claim support. Amounts reflect pre-adjustment business value. Managed in the context of an invoice, not directly by end users.

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Description of the billed item or service (free text), for clarity and downstream claim mapping.

plainFields.name: quantity
plainFields.description: Quantity of the billed unit/service (e.g., '3 x lab test').

plainFields.name: unit_price
plainFields.description: Business price per unit for the item/service before adjustments or discounts. Used to compute line total.

plainFields.name: total_amount
plainFields.description: Extended line total (quantity * unit_price). Computed at entry, never pre-aggregated beyond item level. For snapshot/audit trace.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Creation timestamp for the billing item row.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last billing item update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft-delete. Null unless item removed from invoice. Retained for audit.

models.name: healthcare_platform_billing_codes
models.description: Catalog of billable codes used in invoices/items—supports ICD-10/CPT/HCPCS mapping, internal and external code management. Not modified by general users; referenced by items and claims for price, compliance, and traceability.

plainFields.name: code
plainFields.description: Business or regulatory billing code (e.g., CPT, ICD-10, service code). Unique catalog key.

plainFields.name: code_system
plainFields.description: Defines the type/origin of the code (e.g., CPT, ICD-10, internal, HCPCS, DRG, revenue code, etc).

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: Human-readable name or summary for this code.

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Detailed business/clinical description for auditors and claim mapping.

plainFields.name: active
plainFields.description: Whether this code may be used in future invoices or claims. Not deleted for audit history.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Creation timestamp for the code row.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp for last catalog update.

models.name: healthcare_platform_billing_adjustments
models.description: Represents adjustments or write-offs applied to invoices or specific billing items. Can be positive (increase) or negative (discount/waiver). Used for business policy compliance, error correction, charity care, or insurance remittance difference. Linked to invoices or billing items. Managed centrally by billing staff/admins; not directly by clinical staff.

foreignFields.name: invoice_id
foreignFields.description: Invoice on which adjustment is applied. May be null if applied to item only. {@link healthcare_platform_billing_invoices.id}.

foreignFields.name: item_id
foreignFields.description: If applicable, the specific item adjusted. {@link healthcare_platform_billing_items.id}.

plainFields.name: adjustment_type
plainFields.description: Business logic or financial category for adjustment (e.g., insurance, write-off, charity, coding error, patient satisfaction, etc).

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Description/reason for adjustment. Required for audit trail and compliance justification.

plainFields.name: amount
plainFields.description: Adjustment numeric value—positive or negative. Audited independently from invoice total.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp for adjustment creation.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Adjustment last update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft-delete logic; null unless adjustment reversed or retracted.

models.name: healthcare_platform_billing_discount_policies
models.description: Defines named discount, charity, or business policy for discounts that may be applied to invoices or items. Used to enforce consistency and approval flows; linked to actual adjustments. Only managed by organization admins.

foreignFields.name: organization_id
foreignFields.description: Organization to which discount policy belongs. {@link healthcare_platform_organizations.id}.

plainFields.name: policy_name
plainFields.description: Business-facing display name for this discount policy (e.g., Charity, Employee, Hardship).

plainFields.name: discount_type
plainFields.description: Type/logic for discount (e.g., percentage, fixed, sliding scale, policy code). Used in business rules to automate discounting.

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Detailed description of the policy rationale. Used for transparency with auditors and staff.

plainFields.name: is_active
plainFields.description: Whether the policy is active/available for use. Historical entries are never deleted.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp for creation.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp (e.g., rules changed).

models.name: healthcare_platform_billing_payment_plans
models.description: Payment installment arrangement for invoices, supporting patient self-pay, insurance payment schedules, or internal staff agreements. Links to invoice, includes plan logic/terms and status. Managed by billing staff, visible to patients.

foreignFields.name: invoice_id
foreignFields.description: Invoice for which plan is established. {@link healthcare_platform_billing_invoices.id}.

plainFields.name: plan_type
plainFields.description: Installment or payment plan type (e.g., self-pay, insurance, payment deferral, promissory).

plainFields.name: terms_description
plainFields.description: Human-readable description of payment terms (e.g., amount per period, number of payments).

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Current status (e.g., active, completed, defaulted, cancelled, expired).

plainFields.name: total_amount
plainFields.description: Total plan amount—typically matches invoice amount to be paid via schedule.

plainFields.name: start_date
plainFields.description: Plan inception/start date.

plainFields.name: end_date
plainFields.description: Planned or actual end date of payment plan.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp for payment plan creation.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Payment plan last updated timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete marker for plan archival. Null unless plan is retired/deleted from workflows.

models.name: healthcare_platform_billing_payments
models.description: Represents actual payments received against invoices—by patients, payers, or third parties. Links to invoice, payer, payment method. Tracks reconciliation status, amount, memo, audit trail. Used for financial reporting and patient account balances.

foreignFields.name: invoice_id
foreignFields.description: Invoice to which payment was applied. {@link healthcare_platform_billing_invoices.id}.

foreignFields.name: payee_id
foreignFields.description: User/entity who made the payment (patient, org, payer, other staff). {@link healthcare_platform_patients.id} or external entity. For direct payment attribution.

foreignFields.name: payment_method_id
foreignFields.description: Payment method used (card, bank, external API, insurance remittance, etc). {@link healthcare_platform_billing_payment_methods.id}.

plainFields.name: amount
plainFields.description: Actual payment amount recorded. Must never exceed invoice total unless corrected via adjustment.

plainFields.name: currency
plainFields.description: Transaction currency (should match invoice, but required for reporting/audit).

plainFields.name: reference_number
plainFields.description: External transaction, check, or remittance reference (bank or payer-specific). Used for reconciliation.

plainFields.name: payment_date
plainFields.description: Date/time when payment was received/recorded (may be backdated for offline payments).

plainFields.name: memo
plainFields.description: Free text for payment note, payer memo, or reconciliation reference.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Current payment status (e.g., posted, pending, voided, returned, disputed, refunded). Used in revenue/accounting workflows.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Payment creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp for payment entry (including reconciliation or dispute status change).

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft-delete/archival field; null unless deleted for audit.

models.name: healthcare_platform_billing_payment_methods
models.description: Catalog of accepted payment methods (card, ACH, insurance, check, in-person, custom 3rd party) assignable to payments. Organization admins control available options; required for payment acceptance logic and reconciliation. Not modifiable by patients/end users.

foreignFields.name: organization_id
foreignFields.description: Organization that accepts this payment method. {@link healthcare_platform_organizations.id}.

plainFields.name: method_type
plainFields.description: Kind of method (e.g., credit_card, ach, insurance, check, cash, bank_transfer, external_service, other).

plainFields.name: provider_name
plainFields.description: External or internal provider label (e.g., Visa, Stripe, Aetna, Company payroll).

plainFields.name: details_json
plainFields.description: Serialized details/settings for integration (e.g., JSON params for gateways or insurance API config).

plainFields.name: is_active
plainFields.description: If true, method is offered for current payments; not deleted to preserve audit trail.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Method creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last updated timestamp (for configuration, branding, or status changes).

models.name: healthcare_platform_insurance_policies
models.description: Represents insurance policy information associated with a patient, tracked for eligibility, claim processing, and billing. Links to patient and payer entities. Used for insurance workflow and regulatory compliance. Patients may have multiple policies (primary/secondary/tertiary). Managed by organization/billing/admin staff.

foreignFields.name: organization_id
foreignFields.description: Owning organization for this policy (required for tenancy/data isolation). {@link healthcare_platform_organizations.id}.

plainFields.name: policy_number
plainFields.description: External/business policy number as provided by payer/insurer.

plainFields.name: payer_name
plainFields.description: Insurance company/payer name (Aetna, BlueCross, etc).

plainFields.name: group_number
plainFields.description: Payer group/panel number. Used for batch eligibility or claims where applicable.

plainFields.name: coverage_start_date
plainFields.description: Coverage effective date. Business use for eligibility logic.

plainFields.name: coverage_end_date
plainFields.description: Coverage end/expiration date; null if still active as of record.

plainFields.name: plan_type
plainFields.description: Type/kind of insurance (e.g., commercial, medicare, medicaid, self-pay, worker_comp, auto, etc).

plainFields.name: policy_status
plainFields.description: Status of the policy (e.g., active, inactive, expired, pending verification).

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Creation timestamp for policy record.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Most recent update/verification of this policy.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft-deletion field; retained for data retention and compliance. Null if active.

models.name: healthcare_platform_insurance_eligibility_checks
models.description: Represents an eligibility check transaction against a payer/insurer to verify active coverage for a patient and policy. Used for compliance prior to billing, encounter, or appointment workflows. Tracks API or manual responses and audit data. Important for appeals and claim status tracking. Managed by staff, not patient.

foreignFields.name: performed_by_id
foreignFields.description: User or staff responsible for the check/entry. {@link healthcare_platform_user_org_assignments.id} or other staff id.

plainFields.name: check_timestamp
plainFields.description: Date/time eligibility was checked (when request sent, API called, or form submitted).

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Outcome of eligibility (e.g., verified, not_covered, expired, pending, error, partial).

plainFields.name: payer_response_code
plainFields.description: Code returned by payer/clearinghouse; reflects eligibility check business outcome.

plainFields.name: payer_response_description
plainFields.description: Human-readable description/response from payer or integration API. Used for downstream audit or appeals.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Eligibility check creation timestamp (system entry/audit trail).

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update (may reflect appeals, corrections, supplemental documentation).

models.name: healthcare_platform_insurance_claims
models.description: Represents principal insurance claim submission and lifecycle/updates for an invoice or encounter under a patient's insurance policy. Tracks payer, submission/ref num, claim status, and links to billing codes. Used in appeals, financial reconciliation, and compliance audits. Managed by billing staff and org admins.

foreignFields.name: insurance_policy_id
foreignFields.description: Policy under which claim was submitted. {@link healthcare_platform_insurance_policies.id}.

foreignFields.name: invoice_id
foreignFields.description: Invoice to which claim relates. {@link healthcare_platform_billing_invoices.id}.

plainFields.name: claim_number
plainFields.description: Unique business/clearinghouse reference for claim submission.

plainFields.name: service_start_date
plainFields.description: Date service(s) started — for payer coverage logic and audit.

plainFields.name: service_end_date
plainFields.description: Date service(s) ended — for payer logic (may match start for single-day).

plainFields.name: total_claimed_amount
plainFields.description: Total amount claimed on the invoice after adjustments, in base currency.

plainFields.name: submission_status
plainFields.description: Status in payer/claim workflow (e.g., submitted, received, accepted, denied, pending, needs_info, paid, rejected, cancelled).

plainFields.name: last_payer_response_code
plainFields.description: Last payer/clearinghouse status code or response indicating claim disposition/status.

plainFields.name: last_payer_response_description
plainFields.description: Full text (or summary) of last payer/clearinghouse/status response; used for diagnostic, appeals, audit.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Claim record creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Claim record last update (may be status, response, doc upload, resubmission).

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft-deletion field for compliance. Null unless removed from standard workflows but always retained for audit.

models.name: healthcare_platform_insurance_claim_statuses
models.description: Captures status updates, result codes, and documentation of claim status changes through the payer, clearinghouse, or internal workflows. Supports multi-step status tracking for claims, appeals, and compliance review. Linked to insurance_claim. Not directly managed by end users. Created and updated by staff actions, payer API responses, or scripts.

foreignFields.name: updated_by_id
foreignFields.description: Org user/staff who recorded the status event. {@link healthcare_platform_user_org_assignments.id}.

plainFields.name: status_code
plainFields.description: Payer, clearinghouse, or internal status code associated with this claim status update. Critical for audit/compliance.

plainFields.name: status_description
