plainFields.name: method
plainFields.description: How the hold was imposed (e.g., system, legal request, investigation, manual).

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Hold status (e.g., active, released, denied, expired).

plainFields.name: effective_at
plainFields.description: Datetime the hold was imposed/took effect.

plainFields.name: release_at
plainFields.description: Datetime the hold was released or intended to be lifted; null if still active.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Hold record creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Hold record last update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp for the hold record (never physical unless legal clearance).

models.name: healthcare_platform_compliance_reviews
models.description: Records independent review outcomes and logs for legal holds or risk assessments. Each review is associated with a parent hold or risk assessment and documents reviewer, method, status, outcome, recommendations, timestamp, and comments. Used for compliance audit trail, but not independently managed outside parent workflow (subsidiary stance).

foreignFields.name: hold_id
foreignFields.description: Parent legal hold if review is for a hold, else null. {@link healthcare_platform_legal_holds.id}

foreignFields.name: risk_assessment_id
foreignFields.description: Parent risk assessment if review is for assessment, else null. {@link healthcare_platform_risk_assessments.id}

plainFields.name: review_type
plainFields.description: Type of review (e.g., periodic, incident, escalation, external_audit).

plainFields.name: method
plainFields.description: Review methodology or process (e.g., manual audit, compliance workflow, external review).

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Current review status (scheduled, in_progress, completed, approved, rejected, followup_required).

plainFields.name: outcome
plainFields.description: Summary outcome or result (e.g., compliant, noncompliant, recommended_action).

plainFields.name: recommendations
plainFields.description: Detailed reviewer recommendations or follow-up actions.

plainFields.name: reviewed_at
plainFields.description: Review completion timestamp.

plainFields.name: comments
plainFields.description: Reviewer notes or commentary.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Review record creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Review record last update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp for the review record (audit recovery, not physical delete).

models.name: healthcare_platform_audit_logs
models.description: Comprehensive, immutable forensic record of all auditable user/system actions across the platform. Contains fine-grained details for access, modifications, privilege changes, and business logic triggers exclusively for internal and compliance review, supporting high-volume, append-only event storage. Used for full lifecycle audit, security investigation, and regulatory reporting. Foreign keys may reference users, roles, organizations as context.

foreignFields.name: user_id
foreignFields.description: Actor's {@link healthcare_platform_user_org_assignments.id} who triggered the event (nullable for system/anonymous actions).

foreignFields.name: organization_id
foreignFields.description: Organization context {@link healthcare_platform_organizations.id} where action occurred (nullable for global/system events).

plainFields.name: action_type
plainFields.description: Type of action (e.g., 'LOGIN', 'RECORD_UPDATE', 'CONSENT_CHANGE', 'SECURITY_EVENT').

plainFields.name: event_context
plainFields.description: Structured JSON or descriptive context for this event.

plainFields.name: ip_address
plainFields.description: IP address associated with the event, for traceability.

plainFields.name: related_entity_type
plainFields.description: Optional business entity type affected (e.g., 'PATIENT_RECORD', 'CONSENT', 'APPOINTMENT').

plainFields.name: related_entity_id
plainFields.description: Optional business entity ID affected (matches the referenced entity UUID).

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp of audit log creation.

models.name: healthcare_platform_access_logs
models.description: Detailed append-only record of user, staff, or system resource access events (read/view actions). Tracks access to patient records, EHR, and other sensitive data for HIPAA compliance and internal monitoring. Supports security analysis, breach detection, and data access reporting.

foreignFields.name: organization_id
foreignFields.description: Organization whose data was accessed {@link healthcare_platform_organizations.id}.

plainFields.name: resource_type
plainFields.description: Type of resource accessed (e.g., 'EHR', 'PATIENT_RECORD', 'IMAGING', 'CONFIG').

plainFields.name: resource_id
plainFields.description: Primary key of referenced resource (if applicable).

plainFields.name: access_purpose
plainFields.description: Legal/business justification for access (role, consent, emergency, audit, etc.).

plainFields.name: ip_address
plainFields.description: IP address of access event.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Access timestamp.

models.name: healthcare_platform_data_export_logs
models.description: Append-only log recording every export/transfer of PHI or sensitive data (internal and external). Tracks the requesting user, justification, export type, size, and destination. Used for compliance, breach investigations, and regulatory reporting. Links to related organization/user for isolation and auditability.

foreignFields.name: organization_id
foreignFields.description: Owning organization {@link healthcare_platform_organizations.id} of exported data.

plainFields.name: export_type
plainFields.description: Nature of export (e.g., 'REPORT', 'EHR_BULK', 'DATA_DUMP').

plainFields.name: exported_data_scope
plainFields.description: Description or scope of data exported (e.g., department, patient cohort, full org, resource class).

plainFields.name: justification
plainFields.description: Business/legal justification (consent, audit, emergency, patient request, etc.).

plainFields.name: destination
plainFields.description: Destination of export (e.g., 'USER_DOWNLOAD', 'EXTERNAL_API', 'PATIENT_PORTAL').

plainFields.name: file_uri
plainFields.description: If a file is produced, storage URI for post-facto retrieval or review.

plainFields.name: file_size
plainFields.description: Size of exported file/data in bytes.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Status tracking ('REQUESTED', 'IN_PROGRESS', 'COMPLETED', 'FAILED').

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Export log creation timestamp.

models.name: healthcare_platform_security_incidents
models.description: Logs production security violations, anomalies, and incident events—such as failed authentication, privileged misuse, policy breaches, and anomaly triggers. Includes incident status, summary/description, classification, and incident review/closure tracking. Supports compliance, forensic investigation, and escalation workflows.

foreignFields.name: opened_by_user_id
foreignFields.description: User who reported or triggered the security incident event {@link healthcare_platform_user_org_assignments.id} (nullable for automated/system-detected).

foreignFields.name: organization_id
foreignFields.description: Organization scope in which the incident occurred {@link healthcare_platform_organizations.id}.

plainFields.name: incident_type
plainFields.description: Classification of incident (e.g., 'FAILED_LOGIN', 'PHI_EXFIL', 'ROLE_ESCALATION', 'CONFIG_CHANGE', 'BREACH_SUSPECTED').

plainFields.name: summary
plainFields.description: Brief summary/subject of incident.

plainFields.name: details
plainFields.description: Optional extended incident description/context (redacted as needed for PHI compliance).

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Incident status (e.g., 'OPEN', 'INVESTIGATING', 'RESOLVED', 'ESCALATED', 'ARCHIVED').

plainFields.name: severity
plainFields.description: Incident severity (e.g., 'LOW', 'MEDIUM', 'HIGH', 'CRITICAL').

plainFields.name: opened_at
plainFields.description: Incident opened timestamp.

plainFields.name: closed_at
plainFields.description: Incident closure time, if resolved.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: When this incident record was last updated.

models.name: healthcare_platform_emergency_access_overrides
models.description: Audit log of all break-the-glass and emergency access overrides in the system. Tracks user identity, purpose/reason, access window, entities/data accessed, and post-event compliance review. Supports immediate compliance reporting, monitoring usages, and triggers mandatory post-incident investigation.

foreignFields.name: user_id
foreignFields.description: User who performed the emergency override {'@link healthcare_platform_user_org_assignments.id'}.

plainFields.name: reason
plainFields.description: Business justification given for emergency override.

plainFields.name: override_scope
plainFields.description: Data/entities accessed in this override (e.g., 'EHR_ALL', 'PATIENT_RECORD_123', 'SYSTEM_SETTINGS').

plainFields.name: override_start_at
plainFields.description: When emergency override period commenced.

plainFields.name: override_end_at
plainFields.description: When emergency override was revoked/expired (null if still open).

plainFields.name: reviewed_by_user_id
plainFields.description: User responsible for compliance review after the override (nullable if not yet reviewed).

plainFields.name: reviewed_at
plainFields.description: When review was performed.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Recording timestamp for audit.

models.name: healthcare_platform_audit_log_archives
models.description: Tracks archive/retention management for log and audit tables (e.g., offsite storage, data cycling). Not directly queried except for system operations and external audits. Includes archive storage metadata and retention windows. Used when old logs are moved to cold storage for long-term regulatory compliance.

plainFields.name: archive_type
plainFields.description: Which audit table this archive covers.

plainFields.name: archive_file_uri
plainFields.description: Storage location of archive in cold storage or offsite.

plainFields.name: retention_expiry_at
plainFields.description: Date/time the archive can be scheduled for permanent deletion as per policy/law.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Archive creation timestamp.

models.name: healthcare_platform_notifications
models.description: Represents every notification event issued in the system (real-time, batch, or escalated). Stores business payload, delivery status, retry logic, type/channel, and criticality. Links to user/org as recipient, sender if applicable, and escalation record if triggered. Used for audit/compliance and notification search across all users and orgs.

foreignFields.name: recipient_user_id
foreignFields.description: Recipient user's {@link healthcare_platform_patients.id} or equivalent user table from other components.

foreignFields.name: sender_user_id
foreignFields.description: Sender user's {@link healthcare_platform_patients.id} or appropriate user table.

plainFields.name: notification_type
plainFields.description: Logical type/category (e.g., appointment_reminder, billing_alert, compliance_breach, escalation, info, marketing).

plainFields.name: notification_channel
plainFields.description: Delivery channel (e.g., in_app, email, sms, push, phone_call, postal, fax).

plainFields.name: subject
plainFields.description: Notification subject/title (for email/SMS/push display).

plainFields.name: body
plainFields.description: Notification full body (text or HTML if channel supports).

plainFields.name: payload_link
plainFields.description: Link to related resource or call-to-action (e.g., portal URL, patient record).

plainFields.name: critical
plainFields.description: Whether the notification is considered critical (SLA/incident/mandatory acknowledgement required).

plainFields.name: delivery_status
plainFields.description: Current delivery status (pending, in_progress, delivered, failed, acknowledged, snoozed, escalated).

plainFields.name: delivery_attempts
plainFields.description: How many times delivery was attempted.

plainFields.name: delivered_at
plainFields.description: Time notification successfully delivered (null if never delivered).

plainFields.name: last_delivery_attempt_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp of most recent delivery attempt.

plainFields.name: acknowledged_at
plainFields.description: If present, recipient acknowledged notification at this time.

plainFields.name: snoozed_until
plainFields.description: If snoozed, when notification will be re-tried.

plainFields.name: escalation_event_id
plainFields.description: Associated escalation event, if triggered. {@link healthcare_platform_escalation_events.id}.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Time notification was created in the system.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update time.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion marker.

models.name: healthcare_platform_notification_preferences
models.description: Stores notification delivery preferences for users, roles, or organizations. Allows opt-in/opt-out management per channel or notification type. May include snooze/mute/dnd windows and escalation handling policy. Used by core delivery logic and user/organization preference UIs.

foreignFields.name: user_id
foreignFields.description: User that owns this preference set. {@link healthcare_platform_patients.id} or other user table as appropriate.

foreignFields.name: organization_id
foreignFields.description: Organization scope (for global or role-based prefs). {@link healthcare_platform_organizations.id}.

plainFields.name: notification_channel
plainFields.description: Channel this preference applies to (email, sms, push, in_app, etc).

plainFields.name: notification_type
plainFields.description: Applicable notification type/category (matches notification model).

plainFields.name: enabled
plainFields.description: Whether this preference is enabled.

plainFields.name: mute_start
plainFields.description: Mute window start (for DND configurations).

plainFields.name: mute_end
plainFields.description: Mute window end (for DND configurations).

plainFields.name: escalation_policy
plainFields.description: Policy for escalation when not acknowledged (e.g., escalate_after, escalate_to_role, escalate_immediate).

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Creation time.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update time.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete marker.

models.name: healthcare_platform_notification_history
models.description: Delivery outcome history for notifications—each record logs an attempt or event (delivered, failed, retried, bounced, acknowledged, snoozed, escalated) with full outcome metadata. Enables full audit/trace of notification lifecycle for compliance or troubleshooting.

foreignFields.name: notification_id
foreignFields.description: Which notification this history refers to. {@link healthcare_platform_notifications.id}.

plainFields.name: event_type
plainFields.description: Delivery event type (delivered, failed, retried, acknowledged, snoozed, bounced, escalated).

plainFields.name: event_time
plainFields.description: Timestamp of this event.

plainFields.name: delivery_channel
plainFields.description: Channel used for this attempt/event.

plainFields.name: delivery_status
plainFields.description: Delivery status after this event.

plainFields.name: details
plainFields.description: Extended info or failure message, payload snapshot, or user agent, etc.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation time.

models.name: healthcare_platform_escalation_events
models.description: Records notification or SLA escalations for compliance, regulatory, or operational attention. Links to source notification, target/handler role/user, deadlines, outcome and final resolution. Exists independently as audit/compliance entity searchable by regulatory staff.

foreignFields.name: source_notification_id
foreignFields.description: Source notification that triggered escalation. {@link healthcare_platform_notifications.id}.

foreignFields.name: target_user_id
foreignFields.description: User assigned to handle escalation. {@link healthcare_platform_patients.id} or role user.

foreignFields.name: target_role_id
foreignFields.description: If escalated to a role (compliance, orgAdmin, etc). {@link healthcare_platform_roles.id}.

plainFields.name: escalation_type
plainFields.description: Reason/type for escalation (sla_violation, breach, compliance_required, ack_timeout, business_policy, system_alert).

plainFields.name: escalation_level
plainFields.description: Severity/priority (normal, urgent, critical, info).

plainFields.name: deadline_at
plainFields.description: Time by which action/acknowledgement is due.

plainFields.name: resolution_status
plainFields.description: Resolution status (open, in_progress, resolved, expired, error, dismissed).

plainFields.name: resolution_time
plainFields.description: When escalation was resolved/closed.

plainFields.name: resolution_notes
plainFields.description: Human-entered disposition, root cause, or audit note.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record created at.

models.name: healthcare_platform_reminders
models.description: Active and scheduled reminders for users (patients/staff) or system jobs. Tracks status, delivery schedule, target, message, and outcomes. Supports organization-level and user-level filtering, and is the source of appointment, medication, and compliance reminders.

foreignFields.name: target_user_id
foreignFields.description: User to receive this reminder. {@link healthcare_platform_patients.id} or appropriate user entity.

foreignFields.name: organization_id
foreignFields.description: Scope organization for the reminder. {@link healthcare_platform_organizations.id}.

plainFields.name: reminder_type
plainFields.description: Class/category (appointment, medication, task, compliance, followup, checkin, survey, job, etc).

plainFields.name: reminder_message
plainFields.description: Reminder content payload (displayed to recipient, may be templated).

plainFields.name: scheduled_for
plainFields.description: When this reminder is set to deliver.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Current delivery status (pending, sent, snoozed, failed, acknowledged, expired, cancelled).

plainFields.name: delivered_at
plainFields.description: If delivered, time of delivery.

plainFields.name: acknowledged_at
plainFields.description: If acknowledged by user, time acknowledged.

plainFields.name: snoozed_until
plainFields.description: If snoozed, when to re-deliver.

plainFields.name: failure_reason
plainFields.description: If failed, why.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Created at timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete marker.
